amendment.description: To provide grants for fire station construction through the Administrator of the Federal Emergency Management Agency.

vote.text: Amendment SA 85, under the order of 4/18/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 92.

action.text: Amendment SA 85 proposed by Senator Van Hollen. (consideration: CR S1278-1280) To provide grants for fire station construction through the Administrator of the Federal Emergency Management Agency.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 85 proposed by Senator Van Hollen.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 85, under the order of 4/18/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 92.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 85, under the order of 4/18/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 92.
